getOptions

public net.jxta.edutella.util.Option[] getOptions()
Description copied from interface: net.jxta.edutella.util.Configurable
Returns an array of Options that this Configurable understands.
The longNames of these options correspond to the property names for property file configuration.

Specified by:
getOptions in interface net.jxta.edutella.util.Configurable

getPropertyPrefix

public java.lang.String getPropertyPrefix()
Description copied from interface: net.jxta.edutella.util.Configurable
A Configurable will be configured using properties that correspond to the names of getter/setter methods. A property myapp.someValue might be used to call the setSomeValue method on an object. This method returns the property prefix ("myapp" in this case) that is to be used for this object.

Specified by:
getPropertyPrefix in interface net.jxta.edutella.util.Configurable
Returns:
property prefix
See Also:
Configurable.getPropertyPrefix()
